title: Yukprivate
desc:
Yukprivate is website for rent tentor online in semarang area. User can register as students or tentor in here. Student can find tentor to teach them on their house. Not only student that use this system, but also the tentor. The tentor can setting their schedule, course, online of offline, and others. In this system also including payment with using payment gateway of midtrans. If you want to try live demo you can click demo button at top right. Feel free to explore :)

Student account demo:
username: student@gmail.com and password: password
Tentor account demo:
username: adi@gmail.com and password: password

images.desc: Home Page >> This is how home page from yukprivate looks like. In this page we can now about what inside in yukprivate witch scorlling down in this page.
Tentor Page >> Here we can explore tentors that suitable with me. We can also search by the course and tentor locations. To view the detail of tentor we can click the card.

Login Page >> In here we can login to the system as student or tentor. I've prepared some account demo if you want to try the system at desc above;. Or if you prefer to create your own account it's also possible through registration page.

title: Home Buy Now
desc:
Home Buy Now is website for selling house in JABODETABEK. This website also include admin system to control house property like add new house, edit house information, delete house, and others. This also contain wa contact if you want to talk about the house directly to the owner. If you want to try live demo you can click demo button at top right. Feel free to explore :)

Note: if you want to try system admin you can contact me.

images.desc: Home Page >> This page shows few recommended house to user.

Catalog Page >> This page contains information about house that can be filtered to easier finding house that suitable with your requirement. The filter consists of type primary or secondary, location , and the prices.
Detail Page >> This page show more details information of house, more pictures and more spesification about the house.

title: My Portfolio
desc: This website is to show my projects that i've done. I create this website with astro framework. I chooose this framework because this framework has something unique that possible to combine more framework in one place. Beside that, want to challenge myself to try framework that i've never used. Feel free to explore in this website :)

images.desc: Home Page >> This page show first when user visited.
Projects Page >> This page show list project that i've done.
Detail Page >> This page show more information about the project. Like this page what you see :).
Skills Page >> This page show list of my skills.
About Page >> This page explain who am i and information how to contact me.

title: PKKMB FMIPA UNNES 2021
desc:
PKKMB FMIPA is a website for new student at fmipa unnes 2021. This website contain information of the activity that will be held. Also as task management that need to complete by new student. This system using connection to google drive to upload task that need to have done by students to complete the event. If you want to try live demo you can click demo button at top right. Feel free to explore :)

account demo:
username: user@gmail.com and password: 1234567890

images.desc: Home Page >> This is home page when user visit the website. In here user can take a look what is pkkmb fmipa unnes.
Information Page >> This page contains information about the timeline, guide books, presence, song, and others.
Assignment Page >> This page used for student to upload their assignment according to their group automatically.
Presence Page >> This page used for student to presence when they following all events. To get here, we can go to information page, and go to menu presence.

title: MIPA FAIR UNNES
desc: MIPA FAIR UNNES is a website information about event that held by leader of BEM FMIPA. It contains of live youtube cause the event held on pandemic. This event not only for people from fmipa, but also for all could get access to this event and can watch the event live through live youtube. If you want to try live demo you can click demo button at top right. Feel free to explore :)

images.desc: Home Page >> This page contains speech from leader and also to show the media partner and sponsor to this event.
Presence Page >> People that visit the website will go to this page first to presence from where they are, are they from inside of fmipa or outside.
Information Page >> This page show what organizations in FMIPA. The organization divided to 3 part UKM, BSO, and LK.

title: Bisatani Frontend Mobile
desc:
!Disclaimer, this website prefer to view at mobile and only frontend so there is no connection with backend.
Bisatani is a website to control farmer activity including where the location of his land, when the land need to watery, when harvesting, and other. If you want to try live demo you can click demo button at top right. Feel free to explore :)

images.desc: Login Page >> This page is login page that can access with '/login' in the url.
Home Page >> This page show summary of their land, limit saldo, article, palwija price on the table.
General Page >> This page show location about the land on the map and also information about each land. This page can access with '/lahanku'. Other page also can access by bottom menu.
Notification >> This feature for notification about activity and others.

title: Japanese-Indonesia Dictionary
desc: This program was build to easier my learning japanese language. This program contains the grammars and vocabularies of japanese language from N5 until N4 chapter 8. Search program accept one parameter and return kanji and hiragana. Feel free to use this system, just checkout my repo at github with click code button at top right.

images.desc: Vocabulary >> This file contains vocabularies from N5 bab 2 - 25 until N4 bab 8.
Grammar >> This file contains grammar from N5 bab 1 - 25 until N4 bab 8.

title: RTCWAKE Linux
desc: This program build with bash script and used for auto wakeup laptop when the power is off. We can set spesific time when it will be wake up. This idea is come out when we always need to press power button on laptop to turn it on. If we use laptop as a normal without using monitor it's no issue, but the problem is when our laptop we use as a dock when using monitor. At this moment, we need to take laptop out from dock and open the lid. With this program we can automatic wakeup withot pressing the power button. Feel free to use this system, just checkout my repo at github with click code button at top right.

images.desc: RTCwakeup >> This script can use automatically shutdown system and wakeup in linux.
